content.question: The third paragraph most directly illustrates the ways in which rulers in the Indian Ocean in the period before 1450

choices.label: used their military power to monopolize the trade in luxury goods
attempted to incorporate new territories and peoples into their commercial empires
sought to spread religious traditions by patronizing merchant communities
used expanding trade networks to facilitate state development

content.answer: used expanding trade networks to facilitate state development
